synopsis.text: Emperor of the Sea, a title bestowed only once in a century, is up for grabs in the prestigious Great Raitai Tournament. The tournament, organized by the Chinese Martial Arts Association, is a battleground for the strongest warriors, including the esteemed Kaiohs, to prove their mettle. This time, the tournament opens its doors to foreign fighters, making the competition fiercer than ever. Among the contenders is Baki Hanma, who is battling a lethal poison coursing through his veins. His only hope for survival lies in winning the tournament and securing the elusive cure. But the path to victory is fraught with formidable opponents, including his own father, Yujiro Hanma, renowned as the 'Strongest Creature on Earth.' Adding to the mix is Mohammad Alai Jr., son of the legendary boxer, who brings his unique fighting style to the tournament. As Baki teeters on the brink of death, he must summon all his strength and skill to emerge victorious in this high-stakes battle royale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
